titleStmt.title: The voyage of Italy, or, A compleat journey through Italy in two parts : with the characters of the people, and the description of the chief towns, churches, monasteries, tombs, libraries, pallaces, villas, gardens, pictures, statues, and antiquities : as also of the interest, government, riches, force, &c. of all the princes : with instructions concerning travel / by Richard Lassels, Gent. who travelled through Italy five times as tutor to several of the English nobility and gentry ; never before extant.
titleStmt.author: Lassels, Richard, 1603?-1668.

titleStmt.title: The voyage of Italy, or, A compleat journey through Italy in two parts : with the characters of the people, and the description of the chief towns, churches, monasteries, tombs, libraries, pallaces, villas, gardens, pictures, statues, and antiquities : as also of the interest, government, riches, force, &c. of all the princes : with instructions concerning travel / by Richard Lassels, Gent. who travelled through Italy five times as tutor to several of the English nobility and gentry ; never before extant.
titleStmt.author: Lassels, Richard, 1603?-1668.
S. W. (Simon Wilson)

publicationStmt.publisher: [s.n.], and are to be sold in London, by John Starkey ...,

notesStmt.note: "A table of the names..." [i.e. index]: prelim. p. [7]-[9] and p. [2]-[4] at end.
Part 2 has special t.p. which reads: The voyage of Italy ... Opus posthumum: corrected and set forth by his old friend and fellow traveller S[imon] W[ilson].
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
